trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Cypress
There were no other sightings in Cypress on or around September 16th 2009
Summary: Star-like objects moving slowly west - northwest
divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside work for a break around 2:40 pm & just looked up & happened too see the objects which were hard to see at first but my eyes adjusted quickly. The sky was perfectly clear. I only saw one at first & thought it was a mylar balloon but it was stationary for about 2-4 minutes & I thought it was very odd. Not sure what altitude it was at. Then suddenly at it's 4 o'clock position a short distance away another identical object appeared out of nowhere. This object was the same size & brightness. The second object then moved towards the original object in a counter-clockwise spiral-like direction until it reached the area around the original objects 12 0'clock position & it disappeared completely. At that point the original object began moving slowly in a straight line in a west-northwest direction. I watched until It was blocked out by the building & it was moving into brighter sunlight. The whole sighting was about 6-8 minutes. Afterwards I thought it was very strange but certainly there would be a rational explanation. I don't believe in UFOs in the sense that they are alien craft.
